title: Lagging on league only
body: So when I play league, for some reason, I get 1k to 10k ping spikes randomly for no reason. I can have a nightcore livestream open on chrome 720p while playing the game, having the song have no lag, but league being pretty bad. Even when I put the quality of the video down to 144p, the lag is still there. I've used the hextech repair tool, but it's to no avail. Any ideas to help pls?
